snippet.title: Getting Nuts   by Top Free Games - iPhone & iPad Gameplay Video
snippet.description:
Getting Nuts   by Top Free Games

http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/getting-nuts-by-top-free-games/id515399739?mt=8

Category: "Games", "Adventure", "Action"

****************************************************************************
Subscribe to get DAILY UPDATES with games released on the iOs
***************************************************************************
Like us on Fb: http://www.facebook.com/igamesview
Twitter @ iGamesView : http://twitter.com/iGamesView
Follow Us on Google Plus : iGamesView
Web: http://www.igamesview.com
***************************************************************
If you are a game developer and you wanted a trailer or a video onto the channel then shoot across a message or you can also mail to: igamesview@gmail.com
*************************************************************
Logos and trademarks belongs to respective owners.

Appstore Description:

Climb up giant trees fighting angry birds and avoiding obstacles - but make sure you bring home some nuts for dinner!!

From the creators of #1 game in the app store Racing Penguin, a highly exciting and addictive new game.

Tap the screen to jump from tree to tree. In the jungle, it's all about timing and fast reflexes! Take advantage of the shortcuts - ever noticed some trees are hollow?

Features:

- Easy to learn
- Single-tap, addictive gameplay
- Beautiful graphics
- 48 challenging levels
- 4 different worlds - day and night!
- Collect more nuts to unlock new worlds and levels
- Pick up fireflies to find your way in the dark of night
- Pleasing nature sounds
